page.title: 03MOVING INTO CHESTERTON
page.content: We went to Loveday's Removals on the Industrial Estate to find out how people move house.An estimator calls and lists the furniture to be moved.He gives a price based on time to pack & distance to travel.The removal men wrap the furniture in paper blankets & pack it into large wooden boxes in a special side loading van.An average 3 bedroomed house needs 3 boxes.If a new home is not ready the containers are stacked 3 high by fork lift trucks in warehouse otherwise they are unpacked at the new house straight away.Glass, china,books,carpets and larger items are packed and unloaded separately. This firm deals with about 40 moves a week.Once a month a journey to London is arranged carrying small lots,items from many customers,combined into one van load to save carriage charges.
